column4: Hi, would you please tell me of a good software for Ubuntu that can solve mathematic operations (equations)?
does it have to be free? otherwise mathematica is very good
Can those solve simple fractions operations?
guess you could always torrent it
wolframalpha can, and that's right in your browser
you just put your stuff in the entry box there, and it does the magic
Oh, sorry, thank you very much.
Thank you very very much, this is great!
I recommend playing around with it some if it's for math homework, so you see what's going on and learn how to solve it yourself
